page.title: 20THE ORGANIST OF LONGNEWTON
page.content: {MRS BROWN}PLAYS THE{ORGAN}IN{ {ST.MARY'S {CHURCH,LONGNEWTON.}SHE HAS BEEN PLAYING IT FOR{14}YEARS.MR.RICHARDSON ALSO PLAYS THE ORGAN AND HE AND MRS. BROWN SHARE THE JOB BETWEEN THEM. THE PERSON WHO CHOOSES THE CHURCH HYMNS IS EITHER THE VICAR,HIS WIFE OR MRS BROWN.MRS BROWN{DID NOT HAVE TO {HAVE A TEST}TO PLAY THE ORGAN BUT SHE IS VERY WELL{QUALIFIED FOR THE JOB}SHE DOES. MRS BROWN SPENDS THE REST OF HER TIME LIVING ON A{FARM.}ON HER FARM SHE HAS GEESE,PIGS AND HENS.SHE HAS TO FEED THE GEESE AND THE HENS AND SHE COLLECTS THE EGGS ON A MORNING.MRS. BROWN IS{VERY BUSY}ALL OF THE YEAR.
